 {

 gs.info('bye now');
 }
 */
 
var resp= new ChatGPTUtils().askChatGPT(vaInputs.user_question);

 gs.log("Chat API REsponse : "+vaVars.response);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ChatGPTUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ChatGPTUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ChatGPTUtils = Class.create();
ChatGPTUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {},
    askChatGPT: function(message) {
        var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT', 'askChatGPT');
		var temp=0.5;
		var tokens=1024;
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('temperature', temp);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('max_tokens', tokens);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('prompt', message);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('model', 'text-davinci-003');

        var response = req.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var responseObject=JSON.parse(responseBody);
		var answer= responseObject.choices[0].text;
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		return answer;

    },

    type: 'ChatGPTUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-29 20:43:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChatGPTUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-29 20:43:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

 /***************************************************************
 YOU CAN OUTPUT A SinglePartOutMsg
 LIKE THIS:

 var singleOutMsg = new sn_cs.SinglePartOutMsg();
 singleOutMsg.setTextPart('text part');
 singleOutMsg.setImagePart('https://docs.servicenow.com/static/custom/logo.svg');
 singleOutMsg.setHtmlPart('<h1 style="color:blue;">html part</h1>');

 singleOutMsg.setButtonLinkPart('', 'label', 'link');
 return singleOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 OR YOU CAN OUTPUT A MultiPartOutMsg
 LIKE THIS:

 var multiOutMsg = new sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg();
 multiOutMsg.setNavigationLabel('Click for More');
 multiOutMsg.addPlainTextPart('text part');
 multiOutMsg.addHtmlPart('<h1 style="color:blue;">html part</h1>');
 multiOutMsg.addLinkPart('header', 'label', 'link');
 multiOutMsg.addButtonLinkPart('', 'label', 'link');
 return multiOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 * NOTE: You can include conditional logic when building the
 * output content. For example, if constructing a sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg
 * then you might want to add 3 parts under condition (A) but 7 parts

 if(!(vaVars.response))
 {
 return "How can I help you?";

 return singleOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 OR YOU CAN OUTPUT A MultiPartOutMsg
 LIKE THIS:

 var multiOutMsg = new sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg();
 multiOutMsg.setNavigationLabel('Click for More');
 multiOutMsg.addPlainTextPart('text part');
 multiOutMsg.addHtmlPart('<h1 style="color:blue;">html part</h1>');
 multiOutMsg.addLinkPart('header', 'label', 'link');
 multiOutMsg.addButtonLinkPart('', 'label', 'link');
 return multiOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 * NOTE: You can include conditional logic when building the
 * output content. For example, if constructing a sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg
 * then you might want to add 3 parts under condition (A) but 7 parts
 * under condition (B).
 *
 * HOWEVER, do NOT include conditional logic that varies the output TYPE.
 * That is, do NOT include a condition that might return either a
 * sn_cs.SinglePartOutMsg under condition (A) but returns a
 * sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg under condition (B).
 ****************************************************************/
 gs.log("Response is :"+vaVars.response);
})()

 /***************************************************************
 YOU CAN OUTPUT A SinglePartOutMsg
 LIKE THIS:

 var singleOutMsg = new sn_cs.SinglePartOutMsg();
 singleOutMsg.setTextPart('text part');
 singleOutMsg.setImagePart('https://docs.servicenow.com/static/custom/logo.svg');
 singleOutMsg.setHtmlPart('<h1 style="color:blue;">html part</h1>');
 singleOutMsg.setLinkPart('header', 'label', 'link');
 singleOutMsg.setButtonLinkPart('', 'label', 'link');
 return singleOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 OR YOU CAN OUTPUT A MultiPartOutMsg
 LIKE THIS:

 var multiOutMsg = new sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg();
 multiOutMsg.setNavigationLabel('Click for More');
 multiOutMsg.addPlainTextPart('text part');
 multiOutMsg.addHtmlPart('<h1 style="color:blue;">html part</h1>');
 multiOutMsg.addLinkPart('header', 'label', 'link');
 multiOutMsg.addButtonLinkPart('', 'label', 'link');
 return multiOutMsg;
 ****************************************************************/

 /***************************************************************
 * NOTE: You can include conditional logic when building the
 * output content. For example, if constructing a sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg
 * then you might want to add 3 parts under condition (A) but 7 parts
 * under condition (B).
 *
 * HOWEVER, do NOT include conditional logic that varies the output TYPE.
 * That is, do NOT include a condition that might return either a
 * sn_cs.SinglePartOutMsg under condition (A) but returns a
 * sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg under condition (B).
 ****************************************************************/
 return ("Response is :"+vaVars.response);
})()
